product_name: Granite Gear Block Rock Solid Compressor Stuff Sack - 16 Liter - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The waterproof, 16-liter Granite Gear Block Rock Solid Compressor Stuff Sack compresses lofty items such a sleeping bag or down clothing, and its square shape nests well inside a pack. Squares nest together better when you are packing more than one Rock Solid in a backpack. Compresses your lofty items to a rock-hard state without bulging; maintains shape when compressed. Use the ultralight cord and cordlock to cinch the stuff sack closed. Granite Gear Block Rock Solid Compressor Stuff Sack includes a webbing haul loop. Closeout.
short_description: The waterproof, 16-liter Granite Gear Block Rock Solid Compressor Stuff Sack compresses lofty items such a sleeping bag or down clothing, and its square shape nests well inside a pack.
